flame_repulsion.name: Flame Repulsion
flame_repulsion.desc: Charge up an exertion of flames that knocks opponents backwards. If you take damage while charging, you repulse it back.

fire_forge.name: Fire Forge
fire_forge.desc: Conjure flaming daggers and throw them forwards.

flaming_scourge.name: Flaming Scourge
flaming_scourge.desc: Conjure a flaming whip and sling your foes around and into the ground with a devastating slam.

fire_gun.name: Fire Gun
fire_gun.desc: Shoot successive bullets of fire from your fingertips.

ash_slam.name: Ash Slam
ash_slam.desc: Strike the ground, turning it to ash.

burning_servants.name: Burning Servants
burning_servants.desc: Summon a legion of flaming spearmen that lunge inwards.

relentless_flames.name: Relentless Flames
relentless_flames.desc: Bear down on your foes with repeated fiery slashes.

flare_volley.name: Flare Volley
flare_volley.desc: Conjure up to 3 fireballs to volley at your enemies.

searing_snare.name: Searing Snare
searing_snare.desc: Place a fiery snare at a chosen location. Enemies that stumble into it are scorched.

flame_grab.name: Flame Grab
flame_grab.desc: Jet forwards with flames and slam anyone you catch in your clutches.

fire_blade.name: Fire Blade
fire_blade.desc:
Release a slash of flames downwards that deals heavy posture damage.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

flame_ballista.name: Flame Ballista
flame_ballista.desc: Conjure a flaming arrow and fire it at your target.
